functionality.name: Address Management
functionality.description: Features allowing users to manage addresses and company-related details.

requirements.description: The system must let users add a new address with basic details like name, state, city, street, etc. There should also be optional fields for additional info like apartment number or notes.
The system must allow users to set an address as the default for their purchases or sales.
The system must allow the user to edit an existing address.
The system must allow the user to delete an address.
The system must display a list of saved addresses.
The system must provide an option to add annual income information for the company in a dedicated section.

epics.description: Enable users to manage their addresses.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new address.

tasks.description: Design the UI for the add address form with all required fields.
Implement form validation for mandatory fields like name, postal code, and phone number.
Create API endpoint to save new addresses to the database.
Connect the form to the API and handle success/error responses.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to edit an address.

tasks.description: Design the UI for editing an existing address.
Fetch existing address details and prefill the form.
Implement form validation for editable fields.
Create API endpoint to update address details.
Connect the form to the API and handle success/error responses.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to delete an address.

tasks.description: Add a delete button for each saved address in the list.
Create API endpoint to delete addresses.
Remove the address from the UI after successful deletion.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to set an address as the default so that it is automatically used for my purchases or sales.

tasks.description: Highlight the default address visually in the UI.
Create API endpoint to update the default address setting.

epics.description: Provide an overview of saved addresses.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to view a list of my saved addresses to manage them.

tasks.description: Design the UI to display a list of saved addresses.
Fetch all saved addresses from the database via an API.
Render the list of addresses in the UI, categorized by default and others.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see which address is set as the default.

tasks.description: Design the UI for entering annual income information.
Implement form validation to ensure only valid numeric inputs are accepted.
Create API endpoint to save annual income details to the database.
Connect the form to the API and handle success/error responses.
